sql-statements.statement: select distinct p1.simple_name patient_name, iw.person_id patient_id, i.balance, trunc(sysdate - i.invoice_date) age, iw.invoice_id from person p1, Invoice_Worklist iw, person_org_category poc, invoice i where i.invoice_date between to_date(?, 'MM/DD/YYYY') and to_date(?, 'MM/DD/YYYY') and i.balance > 0 and i.invoice_status <> 16 and i.invoice_id = iw.invoice_id and iw.person_id = p1.person_id and p1.person_id = poc.person_id and poc.org_internal_id = ? and iw.worklist_type='Collection' AND iw.worklist_status = 'Account In Collection' order by trunc(sysdate - i.invoice_date) desc
select detail from transaction where trans_type = 9500 and trans_owner_id = ?
select count(*) from transaction where trans_type = 9500 and trans_owner_id = ?

select distinct p2.simple_name provider_name, iw.owner_id provider_id from person p2, Invoice_Worklist iw where iw.person_id = ? and iw.owner_id = p2.person_id and iw.worklist_type='Collection' AND iw.worklist_status = 'Account In Collection' and iw.responsible_id = iw.owner_id order by 2
